video_prompt: Gondolas ascend and descend on a brightly lit Ferris wheel. A translucent blue rollercoaster train glides along an illuminated track. Carousel horses spin in motion. Luminous houses flicker and shift colors. Wavy barriers bordering tracks emanate changing light gradients. Small, striped candy objects appear and disappear in the foreground. Subtle reflections dance on the clear enclosure.
image_prompt: A highly detailed, whimsical miniature amusement park in a clear, illuminated display box. Features include: a large, brightly lit Ferris wheel with pastel gondolas; a translucent, internally lit blue roller coaster track; red and white striped tents (one glowing from within); an intricately detailed carousel with gold accents and Horses; numerous small, colorful glowing houses/lanterns; clear, wavy, color-changing light-bordered tracks; and scattered peppermint candies in a pristine white "snow" landscape. The clear enclosure casts a soft, speckled light, with visible mechanical elements and subtle reflections. The background is a dimly lit interior space. Emphasizes vibrant light, intricate detail, enchantment, and holiday cheer.
refined_video_prompt: Gondolas continually ascend and descend on a rotating Ferris wheel. A rollercoaster train steadily glides along its track. Carousel horses rhythmically spin and undulate. Luminous houses subtly flicker and dynamically shift colors. Wavy barriers bordering tracks emanate dynamic, shifting light gradients. Small, striped candy objects periodically appear and disappear in the foreground. Subtle reflections fluidly dance across the clear enclosure.
